disciplines.sectionTitle: Move in different ways. Feel the difference.
disciplines.sectionSubtitle: FOUR DISCIPLINES THAT COMPLEMENT EACH OTHER TO CREATE A COMPLETE, CONSCIOUS AND CURRENT TRAINING.
disciplines.barreShortDesc: Strength, control and endurance in an intense, precise and addictive practice. Small movements that tone and transform.
disciplines.pilatesShortDesc: Deep strength, control and flow for a strong, precise and conscious body. Connect with your center.
disciplines.functionalShortDesc: High-intensity sessions that activate the whole body. Energy, power and visible results.
disciplines.yogaShortDesc: Fluid and conscious sequences to move with focus, lightness and inner balance.
disciplines.barreDetailText: Strength, control and endurance found in an intense, precise and addictive practice

Burn, tone and
surpass your limits
disciplines.pilatesDetailSubtitle: CONNECT WITH YOUR CORE, STRENGTHEN YOUR BODY
disciplines.pilatesDetailText: The Pilates method focuses on developing internal muscles to maintain body balance and give stability and firmness to the spine.
disciplines.functionalDetailText: Functional training prepares your body for daily activities, improving strength, endurance, coordination, and agility.
disciplines.functionalProgram1Text: Burn, tone, and exceed your limits
disciplines.functionalProgram4Text: Focused on glutes, abs, and legs
disciplines.functionalProgram5Text: Dynamic stations for a complete workout
disciplines.yogaDetailText: Yoga is a physical, mental, and spiritual practice that connects the body, breath, and mind.
disciplines.yogaProgram2Text: Flow with your breath and connect with your body

ctaSection.text: MOVE BETTER STARTS BY CHOOSING WHERE

faqs.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faqs.q1: WHAT IS NEW VILLAGE AND WHAT KIND OF CLASSES DO YOU OFFER?
faqs.a1: New Village is a movement studio in the 22@ where we combine different disciplines to train the body in a conscious, active and contemporary way. We offer Pilates, Barre, Yoga and Functional Training classes, designed to complement each other and create a complete, balanced and energising practice.
faqs.q2: ARE THE CLASSES SUITABLE FOR ALL LEVELS?
faqs.a2: Yes. All our classes are multilevel. Sessions are designed to adapt to different levels and previous experience within the same group.
faqs.q3: ARE THE CLASSES GROUP SESSIONS OR PRIVATE SESSIONS?
faqs.a3: All classes are group classes. The maximum number of people per class varies depending on the discipline to ensure a good experience and proper attention.
faqs.q4: HOW DO I SIGN UP AND BOOK CLASSES?
faqs.a4: All bookings are made 100% online through our app. • Once you purchase a single class, a class package or a membership. • You will receive a link to download our app. • Through the app you can book classes, manage your purchases and check your activity.
faqs.q5: HOW FAR IN ADVANCE CAN I BOOK A CLASS?
faqs.a5:
• You can book up to 2 weeks in advance with our packages.
• You can book up to 3 weeks in advance with a membership.
faqs.a6: Classes can be cancelled up to 12 hours before the starting time. If a class is not cancelled on time, you will lose the class. In case of memberships: • If you accumulate 3 no-shows within a 90-day period, you will not be able to book for a 2 week period.
faqs.q7: WHAT TYPES OF CLASS PACKAGES AND MEMBERSHIPS ARE AVAILABLE?
faqs.a7: We offer single classes, class packages and monthly memberships. • Single class (1 class): Valid for 1 month • Pack Say Hi (3 classes): Valid for 1 month • Pack S (5 classes): Valid for 2 months • Pack M (10 classes): Valid for 3 months • Pack L (15 classes): Valid for 6 months • Pack XL (20 classes): Valid for 6 months. Memberships renew monthly, no commitment, you can cancel at any time. Memberships also include: • New Village tote bag • 2 guest passes per year to bring a friend • Free access to 2 events while your membership is active
faqs.q8: WHAT DO I NEED TO BRING TO CLASS?
faqs.a8: • Functional training: comfortable clothing and sports trainers. • Other disciplines: comfortable clothing; grip socks are optional. • Towel is mandatory to attend class. • Water bottle. All necessary equipment for practice is included in the studio.
faqs.q9: HOW CAN I GET IN TOUCH IF I HAVE QUESTIONS?
faqs.a9: You can contact us directly via WhatsApp, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
faqs.q10: WHAT HAPPENS IF I ARRIVE LATE TO CLASS?
faqs.a10: To ensure the quality of the session and respect for the group, access will not be permitted once 5 minutes have passed from the start of the class. We recommend arriving a few minutes early to get ready and begin together.
